translation.main-description-span: Here, you are monetized for creating content, watching ads, and much more!
translation.main-description: Come join us to enjoy this new era of the internet with the best of what already exists in social networks and new exclusive features.
translation.partners-tittle: Get to know our main partners.
translation.partners-text-aws: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the most widely adopted and comprehensive cloud platform in the world, providing over 200 fully featured services from data centers around the globe.
translation.partners-text-mb: Mercado Bitcoin is among the world's safest exchanges, and we are one of the largest crypto asset platforms in Latin America.
translation.partners-text-rpm: Ready Player Me is an avatar platform across games for developers, creators, and players, which has the mission to break down walls to build a more connected virtual world.
translation.partners-text-fireblock: Fireblocks provides a suite of applications for managing digital asset operations and a comprehensive development platform to build your businesses on the blockchain.
translation.marketplace-p: At SoulPrime, your digital art is worth money! Use your creativity to create NFTs and share your collections with other artists on the Marketplace.
translation.moments-p: Speak directly to your audience by creating ads for Moments Ads or earn money as a user by watching ads on the app.
translation.whyus-description: Theres is no suspending account in Soulprime In Soulprime your identification is a NFT we created the "Soulbound Token - SBTs" a decentralized id. Come to a stable Socialfi based into descentralized data.
translation.alt-cadeado: A padlock in the middle surrounded by the words 'More security', 'Freedom', 'Confidentiality' and 'You in control'
translation.success text alert: You are now on our waiting list.
translation.digital-wallet: Let your money grow in Soul.
translation.connect-digital-wallet: Our platform has a Staking functionality. This means that any money you put in there will earn interest while you decide what to do with it!
translation.metaverso-create: Have you ever imagined yourself in the metaverse?
translation.ready-player-me: We are the first Brazilian company to partner with Ready player Me.
translation.about-us-paragraph: SoulPrime is a new web3 social network that rewards content creators and users on a platform that uses blockchain technology. This type of structure is based on transparency, immutability, and encryption of information.
translation.contact-us-paragraph-one: Do you have any questions? Send us a message via
translation.contact-us-paragraph-two: or through our main social networks.
translation.any-questions: Please feel free to contact us for any related questions?
translation.section-title: Advertise on the biggest social network
translation.section-paragraph: At SoulPrime you advertise to the public that is interested in your product in a personalized way.
translation.article-business: we help you leverage your business
translation.article-conversion-text-h2: Speak directly to your target audience
translation.article-conversion-text: The content we show users is selected according to their interests, further increasing the chances of your ad converting.
translation.article-performance-text-h2: Let the money go towards new ads
translation.article-performance-text: Our platform has the Staking feature, which means that all the money that is placed there will pay off! While you decide what to do with it.
translation.article-adverts-text-h2: Don't leave it for later, announce it right now
translation.article-adverts-text: Ensure that your ads are viewed , pay for CPV ( cost per view ) and optimize your campaign budget
translation.sectionAds-header-text: What is the purpose of the ad?
translation.sectionAds-ads-goal-traffic-p: Bring more people to a certain place on your website.
translation.sectionAds-ads-goal-community-p: Convert specific leads, unite people with the same interests on your page.
translation.sectionAds-ads-goal-lead-p: Increase the database by generating new leads.
translation.sectionAds-ads-goal-views-p: Convert the most views to your ad.
translation.sectionAds-ads-forms-placeholder: Enter the name for your campaign
translation.sectionAds-ads-container-placeholder: Enter a link to your ad
translation.firts-ads-text: At Soul, your client will never forget about you! Create your first advertisement.
translation.paymentAds-text-paragraph: Drag and drop the file from your computer here or click the 'Select File' button.
translation.paymentAds-paragraph-two: Images will be converted to video
translation.paymentAds-text-format: Recommended formats are .mp4, mov, .mpeg with a maximum size of 500MB. Being only one file per ad and the image will be converted into video.
translation.paymentAds-modal-title-ads: Finally, give your ad a title
translation.paymentAds-modal-paragraph-ads: This title is just a form of identification, only you can view it.
translation.finishedForms-text-title-two: Continue to finish creating your ad
translation.published-ads-title: Payment has been approved! Now it's just a matter of waiting!
translation.published-ads-paragraph: Your ad is under review and within 24 hours it will be published on SoulPrime. Pay attention to your notifications!
translation.published-ads-boleto-paragraph: Your advertisement is under review, and it will be published within 24 hours. Please stay alert to your notifications!
translation.notFound-title-h2: Oops, the page was not found!
translation.notFound-container-paragraph: Sorry, the page could not be found or has been removed. We recommend that you go back to the SoulPrime home page or maybe our support can help you!
translation.pageInternal-container-text-paragraph: But don't worry because we are already working on the fix. We recommend that you go back to the previous page or maybe our support can help you!
translation.tokenPage-section-introductory-title: is the governance logo for SoulPrime,
translation.tokenPage-section-introductory-text: We are a SocialFi - a web3 social network with finance and a unique proposal to monetize your time on the platform.
translation.tokenPage-section-technical-description-: The PRT Token was created on ERC-20 ( Ethereum Request for Comment 20) in the standard used on the Ethereum platform for creating fungible tokens.
translation.tokenPage-section-smart-contract-respons: The PRT Token is implemented via a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain . This contract is written in Solidity programming language and contains the logic for the Token PRT to work.
translation.tokenPage-section-advantages-web-text: SoulPrime 's mission is to evangelize all web2 users, showing them the advantages of web3, we are a web2.5, in a simple way we present the web3 world with a social network that monetizes you for it
translation.tokenPage-section-advantages-proposal-te: By viewing ads consumed on the SoulPrime platform , the user receives the usability token in Stablecoin format . In possession of your Stablecoin , the user can exchange it for the PRT Token at any time within the platform. The customer can purchase the PRT Token at any partner exchange , such as Mercado Bitcoin (MB) and exchange it for fiduciary currency when you want to make your withdrawals.
translation.tokenPage-section-advantages-governance-: The PRT Token guarantees the right to participate in voting and decisions within the network, with voting weight according to the locked time , voting can occur for the following subjects:
Participation in polls to decide changes to the platform such as layout and integrations.
Participation in polls to decide changes in the monetization structure of the user base and content creators.
Participation in polls to decide on launching new incentive programs.
The governance and voting system will commence on August 30, 2023, on our website
translation.tokenPage-section-buy-paragraph: *Governance and staking will begin starting from August 30, 2023.
translation.tokenPage-section-buy-text-paragraph-one: SoulPrime 's Unreleased Governance Token, a legitimate SocialFI.
translation.tokenPage-section-buy-text-paragraph-two: Voting power in platform decisions for token holders.
translation.tokenPage-section-buy-text-paragraph-thr: Token holder can earn monthly income in our staking program (passive income).
translation.tokenPage-section-buy-text-paragraph-fou: Trade the asset easily and transparently on our platform or on MB with the advantages of blockchain technology .
translation.tokenPage-section-doubts-accordion-one-t: How to buy and sell the token PRT?
How to buy and sell the PRT token? The PRT token can be traded on the
(MB), as well as partner DEX and CEX platforms of SoulPrime. Please refer to the list of partners on our website.
*Governança e staking começarão a partir do dia 30 de agosto de 2023.
translation.tokenPage-section-doubts-accordion-two-t: What is the value of the token PRT?

The PRT token is a token traded in the crypto market and follows the daily volatility of the market, similar to the traditional stock market. It does not have a defined fixed value , subject to volatility by supply and demand from investors
translation.tokenPage-section-doubts-accordion-three: How can I participate in SoulPrime staking with the token PRT?
Users who have a PRT token in their wallet are eligible to participate in SoulPrime 's monthly income program; See information about staking (savings) on our website.
translation.paragraph-one: We are the new web3 social network that rewards content creators and users. We gathered the best of all existing social networks in one place with tools that only SoulPrime has!
translation.paragraph-two: The year 2004 was quite representative with regard to the emergence of new concepts aimed at the use of technology, mainly the Internet. It was in that same year that social networks began to emerge. They all have one thing in common: personal information like name, address, social security number, and credit card number. All of this is marketed to advertisers, turning users into valuable products for these companies.
translation.paragraph-three: SoulPrime came to change that, It has blockchain technology. This type of structure is based on the transparency, immutability and encryption of our information, solving one of the major current problems: the manipulation of user data. Therefore, with SoulPrime your interests will no longer be products. Come enjoy web3, the new era of the internet, where you own your information and will always be monetized for it!
translation.token-paragraph-six: The PRT Token was created in ERC-20 (Ethereum Request for Comment 20) in the standard used in the Ethereum platform for creating fungible tokens.
translation.token-paragraph-seven: The PRT Token is implemented through a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain. This contract is written in Solidity programming language and contains the logic for the Token PRT to work.
translation.token-paragraph-eight: By viewing ads consumed on the SoulPrime platform, the user receives the usability token in Stablecoin format. In possession of his Stablecoin, the user can exchange for the PRT Token at any time within the platform. The customer can purchase the PRT Token at any partner exchange, such as the Bitcoin Market (MB) and exchange it for fiduciary currency when he wants to make his withdrawals.
translation.token-span-nine: 9. The right of governance of its holders:
translation.token-paragraph-nine: The PRT Token guarantees the right to participate in voting and decisions within the social network, with voting weight according to the locked time. Voting may take place on the following matters:
translation.list-one: Participation in polls to decide changes to the platform such as layout and integrations.
translation.list-two: Participation in polls to decide changes in the monetization structure of the user base and content creators.
translation.list-three: Participation in polls to decide on launching new incentive programs.
translation.alert-error-transaction-title: Oops! We encountered a small hiccup...
translation.alert-error-transaction-text: We had a problem with the transaction. Check your details and try again.
translation.alert-denied-transaction-title: Oops! Your transaction has been denied!
translation.alert-denied-transaction-text: Check your details and make sure they are correct.
translation.alert-advertiser-text: Add your CPF or CNPJ and have access to the Dashboard and Ads.
translation.alert-signUp-title: There was an error creating your account, please try again later.
translation.alert-generic-text: Something went wrong... but we'll fix it! Try again later!
translation.Não foi passado nenhum campo para fazer: No field was passed to make the association
translation.Não foi encontrado nenhum usuário com es: No user was found with this id.
translation.Não foi encontrado nenhum ad com este id: No ad was found with this id.
translation.Essa não! Um error interno aconteceu!: Not that one! An internal error has occurred!
You need to fill in all fields.
translation.A conta que você está tentando usar para: The account you are trying to use to purchase the ad cannot be found. Please verify that the account exists and try again.
The provided link is too long.
translation.Você precisa selecionar uma conta associ: You need to select an associated account.
translation.Não foi possível puxar as views por gêne: Unable to pull views by gender.
You need to enter the email.
translation.Não foi encontrado nenhum usuário com es: No user found with this email.
CPF or CNPJ format is invalid.
translation.Já existe um usuário com esse CPF ou CNP: A user with this CPF or CNPJ already exists.
This username is already in use.
translation.Já existe um usuário cadastrado com este: There is already a registered user with this nickname.
